title: Static Analysis

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.description: Allows the modification of collected battery statistics. Not for use by common applications.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.READ_LOGS.description: Allows an application to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.asksven.betterwifionoff.AppWhitelistActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

metadata.cwe: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
metadata.description: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.

metadata.cwe: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
metadata.description: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.

metadata.cwe: CWE-312: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application use no DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity', 'location'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to ['system logs'].

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

FCS_COP.1.1(2).choice: The application perform cryptographic hashing services not in accordance with FCS_COP.1.1(2) and uses the cryptographic algorithm RC2/RC4/MD4/MD5.

strings: "event_access_point_wl" : "Access Point %s ist in der Whitelist: Wifi bleibt aktiv"
"event_access_point_wl" : "Точка доступа %s в белом списке: Wifi остается вкл"
"pref_wakelock_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Actung! Wakelock wird gehalten. Nur sinnvoll bei Geräten die beim Laden nicht wach bleiben"
"pref_wifi_on_if_wakelock_summary" : "Leave on as long as a wakelock is held (requires root)"
"pref_wifi_on_if_whitelisted_summary" : "Wifi bleibt an falls der Access Point in der Whitelist ist"
"dialog_expert_mode" : "Переключение в расширенный режим требует повторного открытия окна настроек"
"wifi_on_when_screen_unlock_summary" : "Allumer Wifi quand l'écran est déverouillé (évite d'allumer Wifi quand l'écran est allumé par une alerte)"
"pref_wifi_on_if_activity_summary" : "Wifi an lassen solange Netz-Aktiviät erkannt (mehr als 1KB/s)"
"dialog_expert_mode" : "Prière de réouvrir les préférences pour entrer le mode expert"
"dialog_simple_mode" : "Переключение в обычный режим требует повторного открытия окна настроек"
"pref_wifi_on_when_screen_off_but_wifilock_summary" : "Respect Wifilocks and do not turn off screen straight away (schedules regular alarms)"
"pref_timed_check_title" : "Éveille l'appareil régulièrement pour vérifier si une connection peut être établie"
"pref_disable_on_user_off_summary" : "Désactive la gestion du Wifi si l'utilisateur décide d'éteindre Wifi manuellement"
"pref_connect_to_strongest_ap_summary" : "Connexion avec l'AP configuré ayant le meilleur signal (respecte la whitelist)"
"text_dialog_rate" : "If you enjoy using %s, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!"
"pref_start_on_boot_summary" : "Start the service on boot (if disabled start when app is first started)"
"pref_wifi_on_when_screen_off_but_power_plugged_summary" : "Laisser Wifi allumé quand l'écran s'éteint et le téléphone est connecté au chargeur"
"pref_wifi_on_when_screen_off_but_wifilock_summary" : "Учитывать вайфайлоки и не отключать экран сразу (планирует обычные сигналы)"
"event_no_wifi_connection" : "No Wifi connection could be established. Turning off Wifi"
"pref_wifilock_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Maintient un wifilock tant que le téléphone est connecté au chargeur. La Radio reste active."
"pref_wifilock_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Поддержание вайфайлока при подключении к ЗУ. Радиомодуль не будет спать."
"pref_wifi_on_if_connected_summary" : "Laisser Wifi allumé seulement si une connexion est active (Adresse IP non nulle)"
"pref_wifilock_high_perf_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Поддержание высокопроизводительного вайфайлока при подключении к ЗУ. Радиомодуль не будет спать."
"pref_wifilock_summary" : "Осторожно! Поддержание вайфайлока, устройство не будет спать до отключения Wifi"
"wifi_on_when_screen_on_summary" : "Wifi einschalten wenn Bildschirm angeht (nur empfolhen falls "An wenn entsperrt" nicht funktionniert)"
"pref_wifilock_high_perf_while_power_plugged_title" : "Wifilock haute perf quand connecté au chargeur"

"pref_wakelock_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Attention! maintient un wakelock quand connecté au chargeur. Seulement nécessaire pour les téléphones qui permettent au téléphone de s'éteindre pendant la charge."
"event_known_cell" : "Zelle hat einen Tag: Wifi wird eningeschaltet"
"pref_foreground_service_summary" : "Vermeidet, dass der Dienst von Android gestoppt wird"
"event_access_point_caged" : "Access point is caged: turning Wifi off"
"event_leave_on_connected" : "Leaving Wifi on because a connection is active"
"pref_disregard_airplane_mode_summary" : "Turn Wifi on/off even if airplaine mode is on"
"pref_disable_on_user_off_summary" : "Deaktiviert das Handling falls der User Wifi per Hand ausschaltet"
"pref_wifi_on_if_in_call_summary" : "Leave Wifi on if screen goes off while a call is ongoing"
"pref_enable_on_user_on_summary" : "Активировать обработку Wifi, если пользователь включает Wifi вручную"

"wifi_on_when_screen_on_summary" : "Allumer Wifi quand l'écran est allumé (recommandé seulement si "Allumer au déverouillage" ne fonctionne pas)"

"pref_wifilock_summary" : "Achtung! hält ein Wifilock, das Radio bleibt aktiv"

"pref_wifi_off_delay_summary" : "Wartezeit bis der Wifi Zustand überpüft wird"

"pref_disregard_airplane_mode_summary" : "Wifi ein- und ausschalten auch wenn im Flugmodus"

"pref_wakelock_while_power_plugged_summary" : "Осторожно! Поддержание вэйклока при подключении к ЗУ. Имеет смысл толко для устройств, находящихся в режиме сна во время зарядки и только при необходимости."

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Activity (com.asksven.betterwifionoff.AppWhitelistActivity) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.

hotspot.title: Found 4 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (dangerous): read/modify/delete external storage contents - Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE (dangerous): read phone state and identity - Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.READ_LOGS (dangerous): read sensitive log data - Allows an application to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION (dangerous): coarse (network-based) location - Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.
